title: Corrections & Amplifications
text:
---

The S&P 500 rose 30.38 points, or 0.6%, to 4796.56 on Monday. The Monday's Markets article in Tuesday's Business & Finance section incorrectly contained the stray word "losing."

(See: "Monday's Markets: Dow, S&P Start Year by Hitting Records

---

Apple briefly touches $3 trillion in market capitalization as Nasdaq rises 1.2%" -- WSJ Jan. 4, 2022)

---
